title: owlcatz
author: owlcatz
created_time: January 12, 2023, 05:13:32 AMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 01:13:08 AM by owlcatz
content: Up for auction are 2 Lots of 1Kbits BTCC 2016 chips! More info here:Quote from: Hox on January 12, 2023, 06:27:54 AMhttps://wiki.coin.community/BTCC_Mint_-_Bitcoin_Chip_1K_Bits_Prototypehttps://wiki.coin.community/BTCC_Mint_-_Bitcoin_Chip_1K_BitsFirst is the standard edition, the second is the limited (?) edition of prototypes limited edition, the second is the "normal" edition. (thanks Hox)! I believe I purchased them all from Lesbian Cow ages ago.. Edit - Both are pre-fork(s) and contain .001 BTC and .001 BCH.  Lot 1:ICG Authenticated 2016 1K BTCC Chip - Serial Number is #U01102Funding: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1HGXk3Liy9nM1UDj99krwRVE9HRakE3PqW  Lot2ICG Authenticated 2016 1K BTCC Chip - Serial Number is #F01535Funding: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/address/1LqPMYNLFEWkMrE8f2tddjEu8pDvCTDaLA  Note: If anyone wins both chips, I will include a brand new BTCC pen in a perspex/acrylic case as well! Auction Terms:Bid Format:   Bids only in BTC. Starting Bid:  Lot 1: 0 BTC | Lot 2: 0 BTC Minimum Bid Increments:  0.001Auction Ends:Sunday, January 15, 2023 at 2:00:00 pm (New York time)Sniping: No, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutes.  If the auction has multiple lots, this applies to each lot independently.  For example, a bid on lot 1 only extends lot 1.Excluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  If you are a brand new account, or have issues in your trust feedback, please PM prior to bidding.  Forum downtime:  If the forum goes offline in the final 4 hours of the auction I may extend the auction at my discretionShipping:  At cost in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.Payment in BTC onlyPayment address will be supplied to the winner via PM. Watch for scammers, please.Let me know if you have any questions. Edits - Grammar & fixes/additions to text etc

comments.body: Lot 1 is actually the prototype chip and lot 2 is the regular version.There is more info about each here:https://wiki.coin.community/BTCC_Mint_-_Bitcoin_Chip_1K_Bits_Prototypehttps://wiki.coin.community/BTCC_Mint_-_Bitcoin_Chip_1K_Bits
